select_hdmi_output.name: Select HDMI output
select_hdmi_output.description: Changes the HDMI output of your receiver.

hdmi_output.name: HDMI Output
hdmi_output.description: The desired output code. Which one to use seems to vary depending on model so you will have to try them out (for model TX-NR676E it seems to be ‘out’ for main, ‘out-sub’ for sub, and ‘sub’ for both ).
